articles.title: Director Rian Johnson talks about working with late actress Angela Lansbury - Daily Mail
articles.description: The late actress - who died in October 2022 aged 96 - makes her final film appearance in the Netflix movie and director Rian was thrilled she agreed to take part.
articles.content:
Rian Johnson has told how Angela Lansbury 'couldn't have been lovelier and more generous' when filming a cameo for Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery.

articles.author: Metro
articles.title: My daughter taught herself to read aged 2 - Daily Mail
articles.description: British mother Tanya Paxton tells Metro.co.uk she was alarmed when her two-year-old daughter Sienna started reading street signs - until doctors explained the rare reason why.
articles.content:
When Tanya Paxton's baby girl started speaking at the age of two, the mum was ecstatic.
